description: Try our easy to follow Frosty The Snowman recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Frosty The Snowman Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Using an 8cm-round cutter, cut a curved piece from the top of the cheesecake. Transfer the larger piece to a platter to use as snowman’s body.
Place a pavlova into position to make a head. Cut the remaining pavlova in half for a hat. Cut strawberry straps to cover hat. Cut a small piece for the mouth.
Cut rainbow straps to desired length for scarf. Cut ends using scissors to make fringes. Twist a length and wrap around neck.
Position M&M’s for eyes and nose, and lollies as buttons on body. Lay a candy cane across body.
For hat pompom, stack marshmallows on top of each other, and top with a lolly.
Dust with icing sugar and add a few lollies around the snowman.
